speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Prithee, no more prattling. Go. I’ll hold. This

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: is the third time; I hope good luck lies in odd numbers.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Away, go. They say there is divinity in odd

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: numbers, either in nativity, chance, or death.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Away.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: I’ll provide you a chain, and I’ll do

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: what I can to get you a pair of horns.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Away, I say! Time wears. Hold up your head,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and mince.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: How now, Master Brook! Master Brook, the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: matter will be known tonight or never. Be you in

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: the park about midnight, at Herne’s oak, and you

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: shall see wonders.

speaker: FORD
text: Went you not to her yesterday, sir, as

speaker: FORD
text: you told me you had appointed?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I went to her, Master Brook, as you see,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: like a poor old man, but I came from her, Master

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Brook, like a poor old woman. That same knave

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ford, her husband, hath the finest mad devil of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: jealousy in him, Master Brook, that ever governed

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: frenzy. I will tell you, he beat me grievously,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: in the shape of a woman; for in the shape of man,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Master Brook, I fear not Goliath with a weaver’s

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: beam, because I know also life is a shuttle. I am in

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: haste. Go along with me; I’ll tell you all, Master

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Brook. Since I plucked geese, played truant, and

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: whipped top, I knew not what ’twas to be beaten

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: till lately. Follow me. I’ll tell you strange things of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: this knave Ford, on whom tonight I will be revenged,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and I will deliver his wife into your hand.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Follow. Strange things in hand, Master Brook!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Follow.
